Function Details [hide private]

select(pattern=None, add=False, toggle=False, **kwargs)

source code 

Selects objects that match the given parameters

Parameters:
  • add - add the matched objects to the selection
  • toggle - toggles the selection of the matched objects See ls function for additional arguments

ls(pattern=None, type=None, selected=None, visible=None, includeNamespace=True)

source code 

Similar to Maya's ls command - returns list of objects that match the given parameters

Parameters:
  • pattern - name of an object with with optional wild cards '*'
  • type - object to compare if the component is of that type (either string or python class/type)
  • selected - True/False if the object is selected or not. Default is either
  • visible - True/False if the object is visible. Default is either
  • includeNamespace - does the search use the complete name (with namespace) Default True

decorated(origFunc, newFunc, decoration=None)

source code 

Copies the original function's name/docs/signature to the new function, so that the docstrings contain relevant information again. Most importantly, it adds the original function signature to the docstring of the decorating function, as well as a comment that the function was decorated. Supports nested decorations.

decorator(func)

source code 

Decorator for decorators. Calls the 'decorated' function above for the decorated function, to preserve docstrings.
